title: Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act 2019 (No. 40 of 2019) shall come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act 

2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited prohibition nuclear weapon act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act 2019 (No. 40 of 2019) shall come into
heading: 2. The 31st day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act 2019 (No. 40 of 2019) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 January, 2020. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [15] 3

title: Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons Act 2019 (No. 40 of 2019) shall come into
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 31st January, 2020, as the date on which the Prohibition of 
Nuclear Weapons Act 2019 (No. 40 of 2019) comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [15]
